snippet: The council’s unanimous measure condemning North Korea’s failed rocket launching reflected the country’s near-total isolation over the issue.
abstract: United Nations Security Council officially censures North Korea over failed rocket launching of a satellite and orders its sanctions committee to expand the blacklist of North Korean goods, companies and individuals connected to that country's nuclear and missile program.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The council’s unanimous measure condemning North Korea’s failed rocket launching reflected the country’s near-total isolation over the issue.

headline.seo: North Korea Sanctions Expanded by United Nations
headline.main: U.N. Council to Expand North Korea Sanctions
headline.print_headline: U.N. Council to Expand North Korea Sanctions

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
